column6: все чекає що #EMP я#! маю вирішити всі їхні дрібні проблеми.\n\nЯ заслуговую день на самоті
column8: без дипломатів чи суддів. Лише я і ця велика тарілка гашишних тістечок..."

column1: overworking_stewardship_modifier_desc0:"Цей персонаж ставить свою роботу вище свого психічного здоров’я."
stress_trait_ongoing.0506.desc_leper0:"This wasting disease eats at my body slowly
column2: flaking my flesh away day by day. A [ROOT.GetCharacter.GetTitleAsNameNoTooltip] I may be
column3: but sometimes I fear my subjects look at me and see naught but a leper."

column1: stress_trait_ongoing.0506.desc_gout_ridden0:"This throbbing pain in my limbs aches so
column2: hours of slow-blooming agony crippling me day after day. I sometimes wonder if it would be better or worse if it were consistent
column3: rather than having to ride the wave of torment from dull throb to searing torture and back each time."

column2: a waiting game for this shooting pain or that. Some days are tolerable
column3: but others I can hardly move or talk
column4: and my breathe comes slower and slower. I can feel my remaining time on Earth falling away from me
column5: robbed by this cancerous growth killing my body."

column2: but inwardly
column3: the agony of my disfigurement still burns. I trace the path of old scars with one finger
column4: and the memory of misery comes flooding back."

column2: hacking up a gobbet of phlegmy-blood. I don't even know if that's a new problem or not
column3: not with the constant agony wracking my maimed

column1: stress_trait_ongoing.0506.desc_one_eyed0:"The empty socket that used to house my eye still hurts
column2: sometimes. Shooting pains
column3: mostly. Strange visual phantoms and bursts of unnatural shapes on the worst days."

column1: stress_trait_ongoing.0506.desc_one_legged0:"I press my fingers to the gnarled stump of my missing leg. Sometimes
column2: especially when I walk familiar routes
column3: I can still feel it. The agony of my dismembering comes flooding back

column1: stress_trait_ongoing.0506.desc_wounded0:"I wince as my fingers probe the cut. They come back dusted in red-black scab dust
column2: with a sharp jolt of agony letting me know that my wounds are still very much fresh and aching."
an ordeal too harsh for my battered brain. I need some some relief
for a time. The only question is whether to consume it alone
column3: or if company would help cheer me. [medication_friend.GetTitledFirstName] did ask if I wanted a companion this evening..."

column1: stress_trait_ongoing.0506.a0:"I just need to be alone for a little while."

column3: when I suddenly feel the heavy

column6: and cease clouding your mind! [crusty_old_person.GetFaith.HighGodName] did not put you on this Earth so that you could waste your time away in a stupor!"""""
